title: How Life Insurance Policies are Effected (Life Insurance & Life Insurance Contracts)
author: Solomon Fadun - Risk Management of Everything
comment: Thank you for seeing our videos. We love to hear from you, post your comments here. If you are new here, make sure to subscribe to our channel and turn on the notification bell for more educative videos: https://bit.ly/3hMIfAJ
description: This video discusses how life insurance policies are effected. In this video, you will understand the meaning of life assurance; essentials of a valid life assurance contract; standard procedure of life assurance contract; life assurance underwriting; life assurance underwriting procedure; proposal form; medical factors; medical underwriting; occupational factors; residential factors; financial factors; life insurance underwriting factors; and how to deal with under-average lives. If you find the video helpful, please give the video a thumbs-up and click the like button.
